data.title: A Smart Way To Play The Online Retail Trend: CLIX
data.text: A Smart Way To Play The Online Retail Trend: CLIX

data.title: Amazon vies for its workers to get priority access to Covid vaccine
data.text: A top Amazon executive wrote to a CDC panel asking that the company's front-line employees "receive the Covid-19 vaccine at the earliest appropriate time."

data.title: Factbox-U.S. government, state lawsuits pile up against Big Tech market dominance
data.text: Texas, backed by nine other states, filed a lawsuit against Alphabet Inc's Google on Wednesday, accusing the internet search company of breaking antitrust law in how it runs its online advertising business.

data.title: Amazon's Project Kuiper will seek multiple launch providers to carry its satellites to space
data.text: Amazon SVP of Devices & Services David Limp joined us at TC Sessions: Space today, and he shared some new details about the company's Project Kuiper broadband satellite constellation.

data.title: Amazon asks U.S. to include warehouse, grocery staff in vaccine rollout
data.text: Amazon.com Inc on Wednesday asked the U.S. government to prioritize essential workers including its warehouse, grocery store and data center staff for receipt of the COVID-19 vaccine, according to a letter seen by Reuters.

data.title: Amazon working to make its telehealth business available to other employers: Reports
data.text: CNBC's Bertha Coombs reports that Amazon is reportedly working to make its telehealth business available to other employers.

data.title: Amazon's Zoox Rolls Out First Fully Autonomous Robotaxi
data.text: Zoox Inc., the self-driving startup owned by Amazon.com Inc., unveiled a fully autonomous electric vehicle with no steering wheel that can drive day and night on a single charge. (From Dec. 10)

data.title: Amazon's Project Kuiper has developed a small, low-cost customer terminal for its broadband satellite network
data.text: Amazon's Project Kuiper is perhaps one of the company's most ambitious projects yet: Building a globe-spanning broadband wireless network to deliver affordable connectivity to underserved communities. Project Kuiper has made progress this year with a key FCC approval, and now it's also created a prototype of a key piece of hardware that will help its […]

data.title: Amazon streamed 4K video from a satellite with a prototype antenna for its Kuiper internet network
data.text: Amazon passed a critical early milestone in developing the hardware needed for its planned Project Kuiper satellite internet network.

data.title: Amazon-Backed Zoox Unveils Ride-Hailing Robotaxi
data.text: Dec.14 -- Zoox Inc., the self-driving startup owned by Amazon.com Inc., unveiled a fully autonomous electric vehicle which can carry as many as four passengers. With a motor at each end, the "robotaxi" travels in either direction and will initially be launched as an app-based ride-hailing service in cities like San Francisco and Las Vegas.

data.title: Zoox Unveils Robotaxi, Which Could Transform Transportation in Cities
data.text: Amazon-owned Zoox has unveiled its first self-driving robotaxi. The autonomous electric vehicle is a 'carriage-style' car that can seat up to four passengers, has no steering wheel, can run for 16 hours on a single charge, and can travel at up to 75 miles per hour.

data.title: Zoox CTO Says Robotaxi Is World's First Bi-Directional Vehicle
data.text: Dec.14 -- Zoox Inc. Founder and Chief Technology Officer Jesse Levinson discusses the development of the company's fully autonomous "robotaxi" with no steering wheel that can drive day and night on a single charge. The vehicle can carry as many as four passengers, has a motor at each end, travels in either direction and maxes out at 75 miles per hour.

data.title: Amazon Fresh Stores Are Going After Aldi, Not Walmart; Could Double Its Grocery Revenue In Less Than 5 Years
data.text: Amazon Fresh is experimenting with physical Stores, offering the same value proposition as Walmart: Everyday Low Price, Choice and Convenience. Fresh Stores however target high income shoppers, setting up shop near Aldi and Trader Joe's.

data.title: EU Digital Rules Put Tech Giants at Risk of Breakup
data.text: Dec.15 -- European Commission Executive Vice President Margrethe Vestager discusses the Digital Markets Act and Digital Services Act aimed at major tech platforms that treat their services more favorably, at the expense of others. She speaks with Bloomberg's Maria Tadeo on “Balance of Power.

data.title: Top Stocks To Buy Today As Markets Respond To Mixed Sentiment
data.text: Although stocks surged yesterday on stimulus hopes, the indices showed some signs of weakness this morning reflecting the mixed bag of news being thrown at investors on a daily basis. For investors looking to make the most of this market, our AI has crunched the data to give you a set of Top Buys.

data.title: Amazon asks judge to set aside Microsoft's $10B DoD JEDI cloud contract win
data.text: It's been more than two years since the Pentagon announced its $10 billion, decade long JEDI cloud contract, which was supposed to provide a pathway to technological modernization for U.S. armed forces. While Microsoft was awarded the contract in October 2019, Amazon went to court to protest that decision, and it has been in legal […]

data.title: Twitch sets new engagement record with 1.7 billion hours watched in November
data.text: Twitch's engagement reached a new record level in November as the company continues growing its appeal with wider audiences.

data.title: Livestreaming market report: Twitch keeps setting records and ‘Just Chatting' continues rapid growth
data.text: In 2020, the international livestreaming scene has been a lifeline for millions of people who'd otherwise have gone stir-crazy while social distancing, and it's been reflected in the audience numbers.

data.title: AWS launches Amazon Location, a new mapping service for developers
data.text: AWS today announced the preview of Amazon Location, a new service for developers who want to add location-based features to their web-based and mobile applications. Based on mapping data from Esri and HERE Technologies, the service provides all of the basic mapping and point-of-interest data you would expect from a mapping service, including built-in tracking […]

data.title: Teladoc Falls On Amazon Telehealth Report: What Investors Should Know
data.text: Teladoc Health (NASDAQ: TDOC) is falling with news out that Amazon.com (NASDAQ: AMZN) is entering the telehealth space. What Happened: Business Insider is out with a report Wednesday that Amazon is working on efforts to build a national telehealth business.

data.title: Amazon and two other Nasdaq 100 stocks to watch ahead of index rebalancing, traders say
data.text: The Nasdaq 100 is about to look a little different. Todd Gordon of TradingAnalysis.com and Mark Tepper of Strategic Wealth Partners share their favorite picks.

data.title: Teledoc News Alert: TDOC Stock Tumbles on Big Amazon Telehealth Plans
data.text: Teledoc (TDOC) stock is taking a beating on Wednesday following news that Amazon (AMZN) is planning its own telehealth coverage. The post Teledoc News Alert: TDOC Stock Tumbles on Big Amazon Telehealth Plans appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Amazon (AMZN) AWS Customer Base Strengthens With Twitter
data.text: Amazon's (AMZN) AWS gets selected by Twitter as the strategic cloud provider for serving the latter's timelines.

data.title: Teladoc drops on report that Amazon is building a business to offer primary care for other companies
data.text: Shares of Teladoc and health insurance providers fell on Tuesday following a report from Business Insider that Amazon is quietly building a healthcare service that will be offered to employee of other large companies. As an extension of Amazon Care, the service would offer in-person and online doctor visits that can be scheduled through a mobile app, according to the report. The service would bypass health insurance plans and brokers, potentially helping lower the cost of healthcare.

data.title: 6 Predictions For Amazon In 2021, And How They Will Play Out For Retail Brands
data.text: What will 2021 bring for Amazon? With the company's foundations stronger than ever, what investments could they make to consolidate their position and future-proof their business model?

data.title: Amazon's (AMZN) Zoox Rolls Out New Self-Driving Robotaxi
data.text: Amazon's (AMZN) Zoox unveils a self-driving robotaxi, thereby expanding its reach in the autonomous driving space.

data.title: Inside Amazon: Everything we know about the e-commerce giant's growing advertising business
data.text: Amazon is increasingly taking on Facebook and Google for digital advertising dollars while other e-commerce companies like Walmart, Target, and Walgreens are beefing up their own ad businesses. The pandemic has drastically cut ad budgets as marketers reign back their spending, but e-commerce advertising is booming as people shop more from home. EMarketer forecast that e-commerce advertising would rise 39% to $17.4 billion in the US in 2020, to represent 12% of digital ad spend.

data.title: New EU Regulations Could Spell Trouble for Apple, Alphabet, and Others
data.text: Big Tech is facing heightened regulatory scrutiny.

data.title: New EU tech regulation a 'gamechanger,' tech lawyer says
data.text: Clifford Chance Partner Dessislava Savova discusses the impact of the EU's Digital Services and Digital Markets Act on American tech giants.

data.title: Why Your 2021 Resolution Should Be to Buy More Retail-Apocalypse-Proof Stocks
data.text: These stocks are thriving when much of the industry is dying.

data.title: Europe tries to set the global narrative on regulating Big Tech
data.text: The EU unveiled its Digital Services and Markets Acts, major reforms that are seen as part of a wider fightback against U.S. tech giants.

data.title: Amazon stock price consolidating as its row with Microsoft intensifies
data.text: Shares of Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) are trading mostly unchanged in December as the price action consolidates above the $3,000 handle.  Fundamental analysis: Row with Microsoft over a $10 billion government contract intensifies In a redacted October 23 court filing that was unsealed yesterday, Amazon stated a series of harsh criticism towards the Trump administration and Microsoft.

data.title: Amazon Continues Legal Fight For $10B JEDI Contract, Calls It Politically Corrupted Decision
data.text: Amazon Inc's (NASDAQ: AMZN) cloud division AWS has not given up on the fight to reclaim the $10 billion defense deal from Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ: MSFT), Reuters reports. Microsoft received a contract for the $10 billion Joint Enterprise Defense Infrastructure (JEDI) cloud deal last year from the Pentagon.
